# File vendor/riddle/lib/riddle/configuration/sql_source.rb, line 34
      def sql_query=(query)
        unless query.nil?
          max_length = 8178  # max is: 8192 - "sql_query = ".length - "\\\n".length
          i = max_length
          while i < query.length
            i = query.rindex(" ", i)
            query.insert(i, "\\" + "\n")
            i = i + max_length
          end
        end
        @sql_query = query
      end
